edu.isr.data

Class OutputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.isr.data.OutputHandler

  • public class OutputHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for handling most of the output operations necessary for running the experiment.

      • OutputHandler

        public OutputHandler(ParametersManager params)
              throws java.io.IOException

      • writeWeights

        static void writeWeights(java.lang.String foldName,
                         java.util.List<Instance> instances,
                         ParametersManager params)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Create a file registering the weights of all instances in a specific fold.
        Parameters:
        foldName - Full name of the folder, including its index and extension.
        instances - List containing all the instances of the fold.
        params - Experiment parameters.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If some error occurs while creating the file.
